page.title: 15Dane Royd First School
page.content: Dane Royd opened in September 1984 but was officially opened on 5th september 1984 by Mrs J.Beech, Mayor of Wakefield. All the children who go to Dane Royd are aged between 3 and 9. Mr. Broadhead has been Headmaster for four years. In the school they have twice as many boys than girls. Dane Royd has six full time teachers with six classes and the Headmaster. There are 131 children in the main part of the school and 40 children in the nursery. Dane royd was first planned in 1967 but it wasn't untill 1984 that the plans were carried out. Dane Royd First School was built to replace Painthorpe First School which has now been demolished. So now all the pupils and staff of Painthorpe School have been transfered to Dane Royd.
